arts.ttl: MATCH REPORT | Reims 1-3 Metz – Les Grenats win Ligue 1 relegation playoffs round
arts.sum: It’s Ascension Thursday for FC Metz! Les Grenats lost last season’s Ligue 1 relegation playoffs round to Saint-Etienne at home in extra time, but this time, Stéphane Le Mignan’s side…

arts.ttl: Metz promoted to Ligue 1, Reims relegated after dramatic playoff
arts.sum: Metz secured their immediate return to Ligue 1 with a 3-1 win against Stade de Reims after extra-time, offering the ultimate redemption to being relegated in the relegation/promotion play-off last term.

arts.ttl: Metz predicted XI v Reims: Joel Asoro and Arnaud Bodart out
arts.sum: FC Metz head to Stade de Reims looking to earn promotion to Ligue 1. After the first leg of the promotion/relegation play-off, the scores are tied at 1-1. Stéphane Le…

arts.ttl: Preview: Reims vs. Metz - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Ligue 1 Playoffs clash between Reims and Metz, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
